name: Lifts all Boats
description:
This is a gamejam collaboration by Yasmina1014 and CrestonW. 

Game development by CrestonW.

Modelling and Art Direction by Yasmina1014.

TO RUN:
Left joystick - turn

Right joystick - move

Keeps boats away from obstacles as the water rises.

"Fluidscape" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
